Key Match Events: Son Heung-Min scored two goals, including a penalty, to lead South Korea to a 3-0 win over China PR.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Shenzhen Universiade Sports Centre in Shenzhen, China PR with an attendance of 39,969.
Others: China PR was defeated 3-0 by South Korea in the 2026 World Cup Qualifying - AFC, Second Round.
